name: Laser Defender (The Learn Journ)
description:
A fun basic Space Incader-esque game that I made in my third week of learning Unity. Use the arrow keys and space bar to control your spaceship and M to change/mute the music.

Tweet your highscores @TheLearnJourn.

Good luck and don't get overrun!

P.S. Try not to die while wearing headphones.

All images and sounds were taken from creative commons.

A big thank you to Skorpio for the sprites:

https://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-construction-kit

And also to Purple Planet for the music:

Music: http://www.purple-planet.com
